KPIs.title: Block Production
KPIs.description: In order to have a reliable network, a KPI focusing on block production and validator stability is required. Timestamp of each block can be found using the block explorer (divided by 1000).
KPIs.annihilation: Block finalization lags more than 600 blocks behind head at any point throughout the measurement period.
successEvents: The difference between timestamps of block #1845211 and block #1945593 must be less than 604,710,000 milliseconds.

KPIs.title: Proposal Clearance
KPIs.description: For the governance process to work, all proposals must be dealt with professionally, and in a reasonable time frame to avoiding blocking new proposals coming in.
successEvents: No proposals expire due to missing votes.
At no point will the number of active proposal stay at 5 for longer than 14,400 blocks (~24h).
KPIs.annihilation: No malicious or unreasonable proposals are approved.

KPIs.title: Council Reporting
KPIs.description: There needs to be some level of accountability and transparency for the Council. Weekly reporting of workflow and 'Tokenomics' will allow users make informed votes.
successEvents: The eighth Council on Constantinople (#1744411-#1845210) produces a log of events, with all of the Council's actions, challenges and tasks.
This is accompanied by a report covering its own workflow, challenges, thinking and performance.
The eighth Council on Constantinople (#1744411-#1845210) produces a report based on the newest template.
The script (in typescript) that produces the output is made available alongside the report.

KPIs.title: Storage Provider Post Runtime Upgrade
KPIs.description: After the runtime upgrade, scheduled at approx. block #1916000, the platform needs to restore the storage system.
successEvents: Create an opening for a storage lead.
Open it for applications.
Choose a new storage lead.
Fund the storage provider mint.
Ensure at least 4 storage-nodes are up and running.
KPIs.annihilation: The storage lead fails to run a storage-node.

KPIs.title: Telegram Bots
KPIs.description: Some Telegram bots have already been created, but they need some improvements and to be presented in the main channel. More details can be found in the blog.
successEvents: Validators: At the end of each 'era', reports the status of the Validator set. Also report 'slashes'.
Storage Providers: Reports 'expired', 'down' and 'offline' Storage Providers.
Proposals: Reports all proposal status changes.
Council: Reports Council and Council Election status changes.
Forum: Reports new posts, threads and categories made.
Curators: Reports new job openings and status changes of openings.
Channels: Reports new Channels made.
Content: Reports 'entity' properties changed in the Video Class.
